statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: John Fitchett and Seth Bradley each scored 18 points as Division III Roanoke upset North Carolina A&T, 94-87 Wednesday night in an exhibition game for the Maroons that counts for the Aggies.
article.headline: Fitchett, Bradley lead D-III Roanoke, upset NC A&T 94-87
article.linkText: Fitchett, Bradley lead D-III Roanoke, upset NC A&T 94-87
article.story: GREENSBORO, N.C. -- John Fitchett and Seth Bradley each scored 18 points as Division III Roanoke upset North Carolina A&T, 94-87 Wednesday night in an exhibition game for the Maroons that counts for the Aggies. Roanoke took a nine-point lead at the half and traded punches with NC A&T (0-3) in the second half to come away with the win. The Maroons shot 50 percent from the field, converting 31 of 62 attempts, including 11 of 29 from beyond the arc, and knocked down 21 of 29 free throw attempts. Bruce Beckford converted 16 of 22 shots from the field to score 38 points and grabbed 16 rebounds to lead the Aggies. James Whitaker added 15 points. North Carolina A&T heads to Uncasville, Connecticut to play Buffalo in the Springfield bracket of the 2015 Tip-Off Tournament on Saturday.
